method.name: getProjectReportDir
method.description: Returns the directory to generate the project reports into.

method.name: getProjectReportDirName
method.description: The name of the directory to generate the project reports into, relative to the project's reports dir.

property.name: projectReportDir
property.description: Returns the directory to generate the project reports into.

property.name: projectReportDirName
property.description: The name of the directory to generate the project reports into, relative to the project's reports dir.
